mapper.select: SELECT email FROM user WHERE category_seq = (SELECT category_seq FROM category WHERE detail IS NULL AND sub = 'java') AND is_pass = true
mapper.update: UPDATE category set send_date = NOW() WHERE category_seq = #{categorySeq}
mapper.select: SELECT u.email, c.sub FROM user u INNER JOIN (SELECT category_seq, sub FROM category WHERE detail IS NULL) as c ON u.category_seq = c.category_seq AND is_pass = TRUE ORDER BY SUB
